Package model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
model.Player
public class Player extends Object
Represents a single player in a game of Blackjack
Author:
Jakob Garcia & Brandon Jonas

      Parameters:
      name - : player's name
      bal - : player's starting balance
      isPlayer - : whether or not player is controlled by a human
